oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mardi Gras List
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; parades;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: List of costumes and supplies required for the construction of four floats including No. 301, resurrection tableau; requirements for No. 301: "1 white horse, 3 pair large wings, 1 camel's head, 56 accessories in paper gilded & decorated pertaining to Greek, Roman, & Egyptian costumes, 10 heads of Taurus, 24 wigs & masks of linen & silk, 2 boxes containing garlands of flowers, grapes, & crowns."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
